system.descriptor: Winning in games of chance. Participants wager money, winner takes the pot. User can choose to lose as part of a Deceive Action.
system.uses:
Opposed Test vs Gamble. All Partipants make test, the one with the most DoS, or fewest DoF win.
Skill Test + Sleight of Hand: If user has both Gamble and Sleight of Hand Skills, can make Sleight of Hand Test instead to add +20 to Test. But 4+ DoF reveals them as cheating.
system.useTime: Full Action for an entire day of gaming
